alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:40PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NAVAJO COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MST... At 139 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Twin Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodruff. This includes the following highways... State Route 377 between mile markers 21 and 24. State Route 77 between mile ma, or 32 miles north of Show Lowrkers 368 and 380. Highway 180 near mile marker 322. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
